korean: 오늘 새 회사에 첫 출근했는데 엄청 떨렸다.
아침에 일찍 일어나서 옷도 여러 번 갈아입었어.
회사 도착하니까 HR팀에서 신입 환영해주시면서 자리 안내해줬다.
이것저것 설명해주시면서 회사 시스템 사용법도 알려주셨어.
점심시간에 팀원들이 회사 근처 맛집을 소개해줘서 좋았다.
같이 밥 먹으면서 회사 분위기나 문화에 대해 이야기 들었어.
오후에는 간단한 교육 자료 보면서 공부했어.
아직은 모르는 게 많지만 차근차근 배워나가야겠다.
퇴근하면서 팀장님이 수고했다고 격려해주셔서 기분 좋았어.
내일부터 본격적으로 일 시작인데 열심히 해봐야지.
english: It was my first day at the new company and I was super nervous.
I woke up early and changed my outfit, like, several times.
When I got to the office, the HR team welcomed me and showed me to my desk.
Luckily, my mentor was really kind and walked me through everything.
They explained a bunch of stuff and showed me how to use the company systems.
During lunch, my teammates showed me some good spots around the office.
We ate together and they told me about the company vibe and culture.
Everyone was so nice that I started to relax a bit.
In the afternoon, I went through some training materials and studied them.
There's still a lot I don't know, but I'll take it step by step.
On my way out, my team leader said I did well today, which honestly made me feel good.
Tomorrow's when the real work starts, so I gotta give it my best.
